name: demos
description: A universal stylesheet manager for node.js and browsers
author: Ryan Tsao <ryan.j.tsao@gmail.com>

scripts.bundle-client:next: mkdir -p react-demo/static && browserify react-demo/src/client.js -o react-demo/static/bundle.js -t babelify
scripts.bundle-client:compat: mkdir -p react-demo-compat/static && browserify react-demo-compat/src/client.js -o react-demo-compat/static/bundle.js -t babelify
scripts.bundle-client:legacy: mkdir -p react-demo-legacy/static && browserify react-demo-legacy/src/client.js -o react-demo-legacy/static/bundle.js -t babelify
